body_html:
After solving this topic I think that we can close a bug on TF 1.0.1 after more then one year without response.
Remember the bottleneck theory and the "attention is all you need" 😄 or we will lost in the information noise expecially if you don't have enough bandwidth for all the awaiting response labels.
body_text:
After solving this topic I think that we can close a bug on TF 1.0.1 after more then one year without response.
Remember the bottleneck theory and the "attention is all you need" 😄 or we will lost in the information noise expecially if you don't have enough bandwidth for all the awaiting response labels.
body:
After solving this topic I think that we can close a bug on TF 1.0.1 after more then one year without response.
Remember the bottleneck theory and the "attention is all you need" :smile: or we will lost in the information noise expecially if you don't have enough bandwidth for all the `awaiting response` labels.
